articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Sends Congratulatory Message to Cote d'Ivoire PM
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Sends Congratulatory Message to Cote d'Ivoire PM
 Pyongyang, February 29 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju sent a congratulatory message to Daniel Kablan Duncan on Monday on his reelection as prime minister of the Republic of Cote d'Ivoire.
					 The message sincerely wished the prime minister success in his responsible work for the country's socio-economic development.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Sends Congratulatory Message to Jamaican PM
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Sends Congratulatory Message to Jamaican PM
 Pyongyang, February 29 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju sent a congratulatory message to Andrew Holness on Monday on his election as prime minister of Jamaica.
					 The message wished the prime minister success in his work for the country's development and people's well-being, expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger by the common efforts.

articles.title: American Arrestee Interviewed
articles.content:
American Arrestee Interviewed
 Pyongyang, February 29 (KCNA) -- Otto Frederick Warmbier, student at the University of Virginia, the U.S., was interviewed with domestic and foreign journalists in Pyongyang Monday. He was arrested for committing anti-DPRK hostile acts.
					 Present there were domestic and foreign journalists, members of foreign diplomatic missions and missions of international bodies here and overseas Koreans staying in the homeland.
					
					 Warmbier spoke first.
					
					 He said:
					
					 On December 29, 2015, I entered the DPRK as a tourist. 
					
					 On January 1, 2016, I committed severe crimes against the DPRK. 
					
					 I am 21 years old. I am a student at the University of Virginia. I am in my third year of the university. My residential address is Ohio, United States with my family. At the moment, I lived in a rented apartment near the university. My father owns a very small factory that barely makes enough to support my family. My mother is a housewife. I am the oldest son in my family. My brother and my sister are both high school students.
					
					 I committed the crime of taking out a political slogan from the staff-only area of the Yanggakdo International Hotel. The slogan inspires the Korean people's love for their system. 
					
					 The task was given to me by the Friendship United Methodist Church. At the encouragement of the Z Society and the connivance of the United States Administration, I came to commit this task. The aim of my task was to harm the motivation and work ethic of the Korean people. This was a very foolish aim.
					
					 Growing up in the United States, I was taught that the DPRK is a mysterious, "isolated communist nation" from the mass media and education. This made me an innocent thinking adventurous young man like myself, want to show my bravery in this mysterious country in order to improve my reputation and show Western victory over the DPRK.
					
					 I was scheduled to take part in a university-sponsored financial class in Hong Kong and I decided to use this opportunity to visit the DPRK as a tourist.
					
					 Based on my application's confirmation, I chose to have my tour at the end of December 2015.
					
					 On September 23, 2015, I was having dinner at my friend Stefan Webb's home with him and his mother, Sharon Webb. Sharon Webb is a deaconess in the Friendship United Methodist Church and her son Stefan Webb is an active believer in this same church.
					
					 Sharon emphasized that her church does not support the Government of North Korea and that communism should be ended. She said that communist nations rally around political slogans. She asked me to take an important political slogan from North Korea to be hung in her church as a "trophy". She continued to say that by taking this slogan, we would harm the unity and motivation of the North Korean people and show this country an insult from the West.
					
					 She offered me a used car worth $10,000 if I was successful. And she said if I was detained and not returned, her church would pay $200,000 to my mother in a way of charitable donations.
					
					 Since my family is suffering from very severe financial difficulties, I started to consider this as my only golden opportunity to earn money. Most importantly, Sharon said to never mention the Friendship United Methodist Church's involvement or no payments would come.
					
					 In early October, 2015, I informed my mother very little of my crime attempt offer, but I told that I planned to steal something precious from North Korea and if I was detained I told her that her bank account would receive transfers for my brother and sister's university tuition. She cried and said not to do anything dangerous.    I considered less, not wanting to hurt my mother. But since then, I got several alluring pressures from the Friendship United Methodist Church, leading me to finally decide my crime attempt.
					
					 In the meantime, the Z Society also clandestinely encouraged my act. After I came to know that all members become very wealthy with high-paying jobs after they graduate university, I eagerly wanted to join the Z Society. That is why, in late November 2015, I intentionally revealed my plan of my act to a member of Z Society. He said my plan of action would certainly help the Z Society's goal of spreading "freedom" and eliminating "tyranny". He said if I was successful, he promised me that he would help me become a member in the Z Society. And he even said if I was caught, the Z Society could help pressure North Korea for my release. Finally, he said to never mention the Z Society's encouragement.
					
					 I arrived in Pyongyang through Beijing and committed my crime against the people and Government of the DPRK. 
					
					 My crime is very severe and pre-planned.
					
					 Then he answered questions raised by journalists.
					
					 He said:
					
					 The politicians and United States Administration use the Friendship United Methodist Church to harm the DPRK by all dirty means and ways. The Friendship United Methodist Church gave me my crime task, which is matched to United States' consistent hostile policy against the DPRK, with aims to spread Christianity in the DPRK and increase the support from the United States Administration.
					
					 Therefore, my crime was the expected output of the U.S. Administration's consistent hostile policy against the DPRK and its implementation by the Friendship United Methodist Church.
					
					There is no doubt that the CIA knows the Z Society's encouragement of my crime.
					
					 I took many detailed steps to prepare for my crime in the DPRK while I was in the United States.
					
					 I have been very impressed by the DPRK Government's humanitarian treatment of severe criminals like myself and of the very fair and square legal procedures in the DPRK.
					
					 And I've come to see that the current "human right issues" in the DPRK, consistently highlighted by the United States Administration is simply nothing more than a hypocritical excuse to eventually overthrow the Government of the DPRK.
					
					 I apologize to the people and the Government of the DPRK and beg for forgiveness.

articles.title: Paektusan Prize Sports Games Close
articles.content:
Paektusan Prize Sports Games Close
 Pyongyang, February 29 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan Prize Sports Games closed with due ceremony in the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street on Monday.
					 The games opened on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Taesongsan Sports Team placed first in total points.
					
					 Men players of the Hwaebul Sports Team and women players of the Pyongyang Sports Team took the first place in the premier league football matches respectively and men and women players of the April 25 Sports Team in the basketball and volleyball matches.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued in DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 29 (KCNA) -- New stamps (two sheets) were issued in the DPRK as regards the successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong 4.
					 A sheet carries a photo of supreme leader Kim Jong Un guiding the launch on the spot and his written order to launch the satellite, while the other showing Kwangmyongsong 4 and Launch Vehicle Kwangmyongsong with letters "Successful Launch of Earth Observation Satellite Kwangmyongsong 4" on its upper part.

articles.title: "Illustrated Book on Fruits" Worthy of National Treasure
articles.content:
"Illustrated Book on Fruits" Worthy of National Treasure
 Pyongyang, February 29 (KCNA) -- "Illustrated Book on Fruits" was recently completed by Kim Kwang Jun, a staff of the Academy of Agricultural Science, and Choe Ok Sim, a researcher of Pyongyang Agricultural College of Kim Il Sung University in the DPRK.
					 The book deals with species of fruits and their gene pools in a comprehensive and systematical way and their specific characters.
					
					Carried in it are data on 15 species of fruits and their 303 varieties now under cultivation in the DPRK together with 1,891 color photos showing flowers, leaves, seeds, shapes of trees, etc.
					
					 The book would be helpful to cultivating high-yielding species, planting right tree on the right soil and thus increasing fruit production.
					
					 Some days ago, supreme leader Kim Jong Un highly praised its writers Kim and Choe for their contribution to its successful completion.

articles.title: Project for Remodeling Kim Il Sung Stadium Progresses Apace
articles.content:
Project for Remodeling Kim Il Sung Stadium Progresses Apace
 Pyongyang, February 29 (KCNA) -- The project for renovating Kim Il Sung Stadium in Pyongyang is now progressing apace.
					 Such objects at the stadium will be renewed as football field, running tracks and offices and rooms for various purposes to smoothly ensure international and national sports tournaments.
					
					 The stadium is also to be equipped with larger electronic displays and advanced lighting apparatuses and arranged with better welfare and service facilities.
					
					 Much portion of the project volume has been carried out in a short period after its start, thanks to devoted efforts of soldier-builders and members of shock brigade. The plastering for indoor walls and ceiling with an area of tens of thousands of square meters was finished in over 40 days.
					
					 The stadium is located at the foot of Moran Hill, a historic place where President Kim Il Sung delivered a speech on his triumphant return to the homeland on October 14, Juche 34 (1945) after liberating it from the Japanese imperialist aggressors through a protracted armed struggle.
					
					 Over the past years it has hosted many international and national sports games and major events.

articles.title: Hatred for U.S. Imperialists Stirred up among DPRK People
articles.content:
Hatred for U.S. Imperialists Stirred up among DPRK People
 Pyongyang, February 29 (KCNA) -- The United States is making a dead-set at "bringing down" the social system in the DPRK by resorting to such reckless moves as the "beheading operation" targeting its supreme leadership.
					 The Feb. 23 crucial statement of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army against the frantic moves of the U.S. lashes all the people of the DPRK into great fury at the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 It can be well evidenced by an increasing number of visitors to the houses of class education.
					
					 Looking round exhibits on the atrocities committed by the U.S. imperialists against the Korean nation, visitors reconfirm that the U.S. imperialists are the sworn enemy of the Korean people. And they are fully determined to emerge victorious in the on-going 70-day campaign with the will to take thousand-fold revenge upon the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The same is true of the Sinchon Museum which houses remains of those killed by the U.S. imperialists and class enemies during the Korean War (1950-1953) and other exhibits.
					
					 At the museum, visitors are burning their hearts with the hatred against the U.S. imperialist brutes and the fighting spirit of annihilating them.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Denounces U.S. Worst Double Standards
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Denounces U.S. Worst Double Standards
 Pyongyang, February 29 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is behaving mischievously over the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					 It is crying out for international pressure and "sanctions," terming the DPRK's satellite launch violation of "resolutions" of the UN Security Council.
					
					 This is a wanton infringement on the DPRK's sovereignty and grave challenge to it.
					
					 The DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes is inviolable as it is a legitimate exercise of an independent right of a sovereign state recognized by international law which is above the UNSC resolutions.
					
					 The racket kicked up by the U.S. over the DPRK's satellite launch is a vivid manifestation of the White House's extreme hostile policy towards the latter.
					
					 Washington claims that all satellites launched by the U.S. are legal while every satellite launched by the DPRK is illegal. Such claim is the height of the American-style double standards.
					
					 An article posted by Stefan Landman on the website of the Canadian Institute for World Studies "Double standards of the West towards north Korea" said the UNSC resolution banning Pyongyang's use of ballistic missile technology is a wrong one, adding that this resolution is not applied to any country, to say nothing of the western world, and this is the height of double standards.
					
					 A professor and doctor of the Socio-economic Faculty of the University of Vienna sneered by saying that the UNSC is discussing sanctions over the north Korea's satellite launch but the satellite launch is a legitimate right of a sovereign state and if it finds fault with north Korea's satellite launch, it has to adopt a new "resolution" some time banning the sale of kitchen knives to its commercial network for fear of killing people, he added.
					
					 A colonel of the Spanish Ministry of Defence noted that it is the double standards to insist on slapping sanctions against north Korea as satellites are launched by all the countries capable of doing so, adding that it is also double standards that nuclear capable India and Pakistan conduct regular ICBM launches but no one takes issue with them, he said.
					
					 A researcher of an American nonproliferation center said that he can say with confidence the rocket launched by north Korea was the satellite launch as it was designed as a mechanism for launching rockets into the space. There should be a considerable change in the design if the satellite launch is to be described as ICBM, he held.
					
					 As the international public comments, the DPRK's satellite launch can never pose a threat to other countries as it is clear space development activity for peaceful purposes.
					
					 The U.S. is working hard to prevent the DPRK's satellite launches, absurdly claiming that they "threaten" someone. If this is allowed, the DPRK is barred from launching satellites for good. It is unpardonable double standards for the U.S. to assert that the DPRK is only not allowed to launch satellites, while launching different types of satellites including spy satellites at any place and times in a bid to militarize outer space in contravention of requirements of the international community. The U.S. naturally should stop taking issue with the DPRK's space development activities and halt the above-said moves as they are a grave threat to world peace and security, to begin with.
					
					 It should not make an excessive reaction to the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes, prompted by the conception of confrontation, but view it from a fair stand.
					
					 It is a law-governed requirement of the age of ultra-modern science and technology and world trend to launch and operate working satellites necessary for economic development and prosperity of the country.
					
					 The DPRK's position as a satellite manufacturer and launcher will never change because of the U.S. denial and the former's space development is not something to be given up because of someone's "sanctions".
					
					 The DPRK will as ever make greater successes in the field of space development so as to protect the self-respect and dignity of the nation.
					
					 It is nothing but a pipe dream for the U.S. to expect the DPRK to collapse due to "sanctions." This is as foolish as waiting the missions of the sun and stars to come to an end.
					
					 If the U.S. persists in its desperate attempt to deprive the DPRK of its independent and legitimate rights, obsessed with its ill-intended inveterate repugnancy toward the latter, it will be left with no option but to take inevitable counter-measures to cope with it.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Intensifying Ideological Struggle During 70-day Campaign
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Intensifying Ideological Struggle During 70-day Campaign
 Pyongyang, February 29 (KCNA) -- The on-going 70-day campaign is an all-out ideological offensive to arm all the servicepersons and people with the Workers' Party of Korea's staunch revolutionary idea of making a charge, help them have firm will to do any work, believing in their own strength without the vacillation before any difficulties and trials, boost all the fields in the spirit of self-reliance and self-development and root out the outdated ideological viewpoint and work style.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in an editorial. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is a firm determination and will of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) to give full play to the invincible might of the great Paektusan nation by dint of ideology and realize the ardent desire and ideal of the people as soon as possible.
					
					 The victory of the 70-day campaign is sure to be achieved when all the party members and other working people live and work with the indomitable revolutionary faith and will, cherishing boundless loyalty to the idea and cause of the leader.
					
					 Behests of the great leaders are scientific and they guarantee victory. The party's revolutionary idea always reflects the desire and wish of the popular masses.
					
					 The present times never allow even a moment's indolence and slackness and the slightest stagnation and marking time as they require uninterrupted innovation, progress, ceaseless attack at the fast speed to cover a long distance despite manifold difficulties by dint of great idea and sky-high spirit.
					
					 The editorial calls for fully demonstrating the might and spirit of Songun Korea in the 70-day campaign to greet the Seventh Congress of the WPK as the glorious one of victors by applying the Juche-oriented theory of ideology, the ever-victorious banner of the Korean revolution.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Firmly Adhering to Independent Stand
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Firmly Adhering to Independent Stand
 Pyongyang, February 29 (KCNA) -- Imperialists' aggression and war and their policies of domination and subjugation persist and many countries fall victim to them. This reality requires countries and nations to firmly adhere to an independent stand in carving out their destinies. Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 In a word the independent stand means the spirit and trait of firmly maintaining and projecting the independent principle. It is based on the revolutionary faith and will and has grown stronger thanks to strong faith and will.
					
					 Only when one carries on the struggle with strong faith and will, is it possible to establish the independent principle of standing unfazed in face of any move.
					
					 In order to decisively defeat the imperialist forces desperately coming in attack, it is necessary to have strong fighting spirit of overcoming any difficulty and blockade, courage and pluck that there is always a way out.
					
					 One should make a bold decision and dynamically put it into practice if the one thinks that one's cause is just and it is for the sake of the country and the nation, not wavering or reading others' faces no matter what they may say. 
					
					 Countries, though small and weak, should channel primary efforts into bolstering up their military muscle. Only then can they successfully establish the independent stand and successfully carry out revolution and construction.
					
					 Without strengthening the independence of national economy it is absolutely impossible to take an independent road.
					
					 United efforts are a driving force to overcome any difficulty and give full play to inexhaustible efforts and a sure guarantee for winning all victories.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye's High-handed and Arbitrary Practices Are Last-ditch Efforts of Doomed: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye's High-handed and Arbitrary Practices Are Last-ditch Efforts of Doomed: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, February 29 (KCNA) -- Those who played a leading role in the presidential election of south Korea in 2013 while chanting "Vote for Park" are shaking their heads, saying that they chose her as a "president" by mistake and felt self-abasement.
					 As the south Korean people have spent 3 years in a nightmare being deprived of democracy and human rights during Park Geun Hye's tenure of office, they are mocking at her, saying that she is following in the footsteps of her father and putting him into the shade.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun on Monday says this in a commentary. 
					
					 It goes on: Park Geun Hye's high-handed and arbitrary practice can never be otherwise as she carried forward her father's "yusin" dictatorship.
					
					 Park has a fit of confrontation hysteria more often than not and this is the height of the high-handed and arbitrary practices.
					
					 When her foolish scenario to stifle the north went totally bankrupt, she has gone mad, touching off resentment of all compatriots.
					
					 Park looks depressed as nothing goes as she intended and, at the same time, is suffering from hypochondria over the imminent ruin of south Korea and her doom. Her reckless behavior these days is nothing but a last-ditch effort of the doomed.
					
					 It was none other than traitor Park Geun Hye who threw away herself the signboard of "confidence-building process," revealing her true colors as a wicked confrontation maniac, not content with driving into a bankruptcy a lot of small and medium entrepreneurs of south Korea staking their fates on the Kaesong Industrial Zone, while claiming her action would bring "bitter pain" to someone.
					
					 It is the unanimous view of the south Korean public that it and the nation should not be allowed to suffer any longer due to Park and the earlier ouster of her, the better.

articles.title: Miserable Human Rights Situation in U.S. and Western Countries Disclosed (3)
articles.content:
Miserable Human Rights Situation in U.S. and Western Countries Disclosed (3)
 Pyongyang, February 29 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Association for Human Rights Studies in an indictment on Feb. 23 disclosed that the U.S. and the western countries are wantonly violating the rights of refugees after causing the worst refugee crisis.
					 The number of refugees went beyond 60 million in the world according to the recent data available from the UN, the indictment said, adding:  This refugee crisis is the inevitable product of the U.S. and the West's policy of interference for domination and hegemony.
					
					 It is the trite method of the U.S. and western countries to interfere in the social and political issues of the developing countries to aggravate antagonism and contradiction among nations and tribes and get craftily involved in disputes and escalate them.
					
					 U.S. tentacles were stretched to such countries as Iraq, Afghanistan, Libya and Yemen, destroying everything and reducing many war-torn countries to the states flooded with refugees.
					
					 The "anti-terrorism war" launched by the U.S. by taking advantage of the September 11 incident is state-sponsored terrorism against sovereign states and a war of aggression of new version.
					
					 Air strikes against Syria being made by the U.S. and the West under the pretext of "anti-terrorism war" are producing an unprecedented number of refugees.
					
					 Syria is now in the grip of the world's worst crisis and 4 million Syrians are on the way for taking shelters.
					
					 The U.S. is making air raids on Syria with neither approval nor request.
					
					 Ceaseless war caused by "Arab spring" engineered by the U.S. and the West is turning the regional countries into ruins and their inhabitants are wandering in quest of means of living.
					
					 The refugee issue spawned by the U.S. and western countries is the human rights abuse and, therefore, it is their responsibility and duty under international law to settle the issue of refugees and guarantee their rights.
					
					 However, the U.S. and the West are evading their responsibility and wantonly violating the rights of refugees.
					
					 The U.S., chief architect of the crisis, remains a passive onlooker to it, claiming that the world should share the responsibility for it though Europe was embroiled in it for having toed the U.S. policy.
					
					 Even the European countries which had created good impression by receiving refugees in the early period of the crisis are taking such measures one after another as preventing refugees from entering their countries and maltreating and expelling those already entered under the pretexts of social unrest and factor of terrorism. 
					
					  Germany, Austria, France and many other countries, in a bid to block the influx of refugees, reintroduced 6 months-long border security control system. It was followed by the decision of EU to extend the border control period in countries of Schengen area to 2 years and create "EU Border Coast Guards" involving 1,500 troops.
					
					 Sweden announced that it would expel over 100,000 refugees, 45 percent of them, Finland 20,000 and Austria 50,000 under various pretexts.
					
					 Switzerland took a measure to seize cash more than 1,000 Fr and valuables from refugees and give receipts instead. Following its example, Denmark adopted a bill on confiscating their properties.
					
					 Public demos protesting governments' refugee policy are going on in Germany and Britain day after day. Hundreds of demonstrators are staging protest demos in Poland, the Czech Republic and Slovakia, causing social chaos.
					
					 When France, Germany and other west European countries suggested "proportional share" of refugees as a stopgap measure, east European countries are rejecting it as an unfair one.
					
					 A large chunk of refugees are drowning while traveling to Europe.
					
					 Even those refugees who could barely land in Europe are subject to unbearable misfortune and pain due to the intentional and undisguised human rights abuses by the European countries styling themselves "human rights champions".
					
					 Britain is preparing a bill designed to tighten security control in such places where refugees may work as construction sites and private home cleaning companies and to fine organs and individuals that employed refugees and even sentence them to two years in prison.
					
					 More than 200 fire cases against refugees occurred in Germany and 70 odd dead refugees were found at an abandoned refrigerator car on an express highway of Austria in 2015.
					
					 According to a recent survey quoted by the European Police Organization, more than 10,000 children among incoming refugees were missing in European countries, most of whom fell victim to flesh trafficking and slave trade.
					
					 The British newspaper Independent on Dec. 17, 2015 recalled that 1,500 Kosovo people and 800 Iraqi and Afghanistan refugees, who had immigrated to Austria, expressed while going back home unbearable anger at bitter humiliation and treatment as "terrorists" there.
					
					 Now human rights abuses in the U.S. and other western countries are being committed institutionally due to policies of their governments and this matter can be settled only when a genuine human rights mechanism is built in those countries.
					
					 The U.S. and other western countries should no longer find fault with others' human rights performance, describing themselves as "icons of defending human rights", but focus on minding their own business.

articles.title: Japan's Official Apology and Reparation Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Japan's Official Apology and Reparation Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Association of Bereaved Families of Victims of the Sexual Slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army held a press conference in Kwangju City, Kyonggi Province on February 27 and urged the Japanese government to nullify the "agreement" on the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and pay an official apology and legal reparation, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 As the "agreement" concluded between south Korea and Japan is a product of the political conspiracy ignoring victims, the organization can never acknowledge it and declares it legally invalid, the organization said, and went on:
					
					 The Japanese government is being engrossed in distorting the history and making reckless remarks.
					
					 The organization urged Japan to make official apology and legal reparation.

articles.title: Bill on Preventing Terrorism Accused by S. Korean
articles.content:
Bill on Preventing Terrorism Accused by S. Korean
 Pyongyang, February 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Oh My News posted on Feb. 16 an article titled "'bill on preventing terrorism' is an emergency measure for 2016" typed by Ri Sang Hui, member of the Bar Association for Democratic Society.
					 The article said:
					
					 The thing urgently needed by the south Koreans is a dialogue for peace, not the "bill on preventing terrorism" full of elements of human rights abuses.
					
					 The bill is only the "emergency measure" for 2016 for the victims unreasonably jailed and wounded by the tortures due to the past "emergency measures".

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Condemned for Carrying Forward "Yusin" Dictatorship
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Condemned for Carrying Forward "Yusin" Dictatorship
 Pyongyang, February 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Oh My News carried an article on February 23, condemning the present executive of south Korea for going mad in carrying forward "yusin" dictatorship.
					 The article said that three-year tenure of office by Park Geun Hye was, in a word, the same as Park Chung-hee.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The "three-year plan for the economic innovation" representing the economic policy of the present "government" is a copy of the "five-year plan for the economic development" in Park Chung-hee's tenure of office, and the model of the present development policy imitates the "new village movement" in Park Chung-hee era.
					
					 What is serious is that Park Geun Hye following her father's footsteps does not get success, and the people's living has reached a serious level in her era.

articles.title: Emergency Seminar Held in Tokyo
articles.content:
Emergency Seminar Held in Tokyo
 Pyongyang, February 29 (KCNA) -- An emergency seminar on the recent situation in the Korean Peninsula was held in Tokyo on Feb. 22 under the sponsorship of the National Association for the Promotion of Japan-Korea Diplomatic Relations.
					 Present there were personages of various strata in Japan.
					
					 Former Prime Minister of Japan Tomiichi Murayama, chairman of the association, said that the seminar was held to cope with the acute situation in the Korean Peninsula aggravated by the "sanctions" moves of the U.S. and its followers after the first H-bomb test and successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 of the DPRK.
					
					 Haruki Wada, honorary professor of Tokyo University, in a speech referred to the gravity of the situation around the Korean Peninsula, saying that Abe regime's hostile policy toward the DPRK is barring the dialogue between the two countries.
					
					 Yoshiki Mine, lecturer of Tokyo University, slammed the U.S. for shifting the responsibility for solving the issue on to the other, while insisting on the dismantlement of the DPRK's nuclear weapons first.
					
					 He disclosed the injustice of double standards of the U.S. and its followers and the UNSC "resolution" finding fault with the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					
					 The issue of boosting NGO exchanges between the two countries to cope with the prevailing situation was underlined at the seminar.

articles.title: Russian Newspapers Laud Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Russian Newspapers Laud Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 29 (KCNA) -- Russian newspapers carried special write-ups illustrated with portraits of smiling leader Kim Jong Il and his photos on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 The Feb. 2nd issue of the newspaper Nakhodkinski Rabochi introduced Kim Jong Il's love for the people and future, saying that every picturesque place and pleasure park haunted by the people is closely related with his great leadership.
					
					 Byvor On Feb. 5 said that he devoted his all to the country and people.
					
					 The 6th issue of Veteran praised the ideological and theoretical exploits of Kim Jong Il who led the Korean revolution to victory true to the cause of President Kim Il Sung, the founder of the Songun idea.
					
					 Vladivostok on Feb. 10 praised Kim Jong Il, whom the Korean people uphold as the eternal leader, as a model of genuine patriots.
					
					 Zhebri Deve, an internet paper of Khabarovsk Territory, on Feb. 2 said that Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il ushered in the era of fresh surge of the socialist cause through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities and outstanding Songun leadership.
					
					 Internet paper Edinaya Korea on Feb. 3 carried an article praising him for bolstering up the national military capabilities and thus saving the Korean Peninsula from the danger of war and defending the destiny of the entire Korean nation under the uplifted banner of Songun.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Celebrated Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Celebrated Abroad
 Pyongyang, February 29 (KCNA) -- Meetings celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) took place in Mexico, Peru, Norway, Austria and Bangladesh between Feb. 7 and 12.
					 Displayed at the venues of the meetings were photos showing the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There were also their works, and books and photos introducing the Korean army and people in their struggle to hasten the final victory.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico said that Kim Jong Il reliably protected the country's sovereignty from the imperialist allied forces' vicious challenges and moves to stifle it with his unique Songun politics and turned the DPRK into a politico-ideological giant and military power.
					
					 The chief of a radio station in Peru praised him as an outstanding leader and benevolent father of all people who developed and enriched the Juche idea as the great guiding one in the era of independence and devoted his all to the country's prosperity and people's happiness and the cause of human independence.
					
					 The chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway said that the DPRK ranked itself among the satellite manufacturers and launchers thanks the firm groundwork for building a thriving nation provided by him.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings held in Norway and Austria.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Celebrated DPRK Missions Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Celebrated DPRK Missions Abroad
 Pyongyang, February 29 (KCNA) -- Receptions, photo and book exhibitions and film shows took place in the DPRK missions in Khabarovsk of Russia, Iran, India, Pakistan, Nepal, Bangladesh, Singapore, UK, Austria, Italy, Poland, Algeria, Equatorial Guinea, Ethiopia and Peru, and the DPRK permanent mission to the UN Office and international organizations in Geneva between Feb 11 and 16 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 Displayed in the venues of the events were photos dealing with immortal feats of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Displayed there were their works, and books and photos introducing the struggle of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 A vice prime minister of the Khabarovsk Territorial Government of Russia praised Kim Jong Il as the great politician who made immortal contribution to strengthening the country's military capability and developing the economy and the traditional Russia-DPRK friendly relations.
					
					 A vice minister of Foreign Affairs of Iran noted that the Iranian people supported the Korean people in their just struggle to independently realize the country's reunification without outside forces' interference.
					
					 The chairman of the Foreign Affairs Committee of the Senate of Pakistan said that Kim Jong Il was the great leader who turned the DPRK into a powerful country and devoted his whole life to the people.
					
					 The minister of Information of Bangladesh said that the DPRK has steadily developed despite the imperialists' challenges and moves to stifle it under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The general secretary of the C.C., the New Communist Party of Britain and the vice-chairman and concurrently international secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist) praised Kim Jong Il's whole life as the one of the gifted thinker and theoretician and peerless statesman who turned the DPRK into a political and ideological power and military power.

articles.title: Philippine Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
articles.content:
Philippine Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
 Pyongyang, February 29 (KCNA) -- A Philippine preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was formed on Feb. 16.
					 Rafael Mariano, president of the Philippines Solidarity Committee for Peace and Reunification in the Korean Peninsula, Luzviminda Jlagan, member of the parliament, and other figures were elected co-chairmen of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events praising immortal feats of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 It also decided to conduct positive activities denouncing the U.S. imperialists and their followers' moves to stifle the DPRK, and supporting the just cause of the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Thai Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Thai Figure
 Pyongyang, February 29 (KCNA) -- Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, on Feb. 15 issued a statement on the occasion of leader Kim Jong Il's birth anniversary.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Korean people hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission as he laid groundwork for the country's eternal prosperity.
					
					 He focused everything on building up the country's military strength after President Kim Il Sung's demise and on the basis of it, made it possible to steadily strengthen the country's overall national power.
					
					 He ensured that the Korean army and people are more firmly armed with the Juche idea, Songun idea and consolidated the single-minded unity which all the service personnel and people share idea and fate with the leader, closely rallied around him.
					
					 With the remarkable development of science and technology, the DPRK has ranked itself among a few satellite manufacturers and launchers in the world.
					
					 His feats will shine forever along with the victorious history of the DPRK which is thriving on a daily basis under the leadership of HE Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Will Be Made to Pay Dear Price: Nigerian Body
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Will Be Made to Pay Dear Price: Nigerian Body
 Pyongyang, February 29 (KCNA) -- An article titled "Park Geun Hye regime will be made to pay dear price for suspension of operation of Kaesong Industrial Zone" was posted by the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on its website on February 13.
					 The article said:
					
					 The successful launch of the earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 stunned the world.
					
					 This is a proud fruition of the DPRK's policy of attaching importance to science and technology manifested through the legitimate exercise of the right to use space for peaceful purposes.
					
					 And it is a great event of the Korean people as it demonstrated their pride on a high stage.
					
					 But the U.S. and the Park Geun Hye regime declared the total suspension of the operation of the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ), not content with imposing sanctions on the DPRK, while branding its satellite launch for peaceful purposes as a violation of the UN "resolution".
					
					 The KIZ is a symbol of the reconciliation, unity and cooperation of the Korean nation and a product of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 Park is silly as she is not able to estimate how much the south Korean enterprisers have benefited from the zone.
					
					 Just as the south Korean people denounced her with indignation, the total suspension of the operation of the KIZ is as foolish an act as lifting an axe to cut her own foot.
					
					 Due to such a foolish act the south Korean enterprisers and people met a sudden misfortune and the Park group of traitors will have to pay a dear price for it.
					
					 The south Korean puppet regime will be made to keenly experience the high price it will have pay for the suspension.

articles.title: DPRK's Satellite Launch Supported by International Organization
articles.content:
DPRK's Satellite Launch Supported by International Organization
 Pyongyang, February 28 (KCNA) -- The International Anti-Imperialism Coordinating Committee issued a statement on February 14 supporting the DPRK's successful launch of the earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4.
					 The successful satellite launch is a victory of the Korean people and an indication of abilities of scientists and technicians of the DPRK, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 We denounce the U.S.-led imperialist forces for their racket over the above-said satellite launch.
					
					 We condemn the imperialist forces for threatening the DPRK while branding the satellite launch as a "weapon test" even though the DPRK clarified the launch is for peaceful purposes.
					
					 It is the U.S. that posed a military threat to the DPRK while running amuck to ignite a war.
					
					 The DPRK has a legitimate and just right to launch a satellite as an independent state.
					
					 The anti-imperialist peace-loving people of the world send solidarity to the efforts of the DPRK and its people to build their own strength.

articles.title: Estudiante norteamericano Warmbier confiesa sus crimenes anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Estudiante norteamericano Warmbier confiesa sus crimenes anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 29 de febrero (ACNC) -- Otto Frederick Warmbier, estudiante de la Universidad de Virginia de Estados Unidos, quien fue detenido por sus actos hostiles contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, concedio el dia 29 en esta capital una rueda de prensa. 
					Tomaron parte alli los reporteros internos y externos, los miembros de las representaciones diplomaticas y de organizaciones internacionales acreditadas en Corea y compatriotas ultramarinos quienes permanecen en la RPDC. 
					
					Warmbier confeso sus crimenes como sigue:
					
					El 29 de diciembre de 2015, entre en la RPDC en calidad de turista.
					
					El primero de enero de 2016 cometi graves crimenes anti-RPDC.
					
					Tengo 21 anos de edad y soy estudiante de tercer grado de la Universidad de Virginia de Estados Unidos.
					
					La direccion de mi residencia es Ohio donde viven mis padres y hermanos. Antes de venir aqui, vivi en un apartamento de alquiler en Virginia cercano a la universidad.
					
					Mi padre gestiona una pequena fabrica para sostener la familia. Mi madre es de manutencion. Soy el primogenito de mi familia. Mi hermano y hermana menores son alumnos de la escuela superior.
					
					El dia 1 de enero de 2016, cometi el crimen de descolgar una consigna politica en el area de empleados del Hotel Internacional Yanggakdo. Esa consigna infunde al pueblo coreano el sentimiento de carino a su regimen.
					
					La Iglesia Metodista Unida de Amistad me dio esa mision. Y bajo instigacion de la Sociedad Z y el consentimiento tacito de la administracion norteamericana, vine aqui para cumplir esa mision. El objetivo de mi tarea fue desalentar el espiritu de lucha y pasion del pueblo coreano. Pero eso fue una tonteria.
					
					Creciendo en Estados Unidos, recibi en las escuelas y a traves de medios de informacion la educacion de que la RPDC es una nacion comunista misteriosa y aislada. 
					
					Eso incito a las personas jovenes aventureros como yo  hacer un acto valiente para mostrar la superioridad del Occidente sobre la RPDC. 
					
					Planee visitar la RPDC aprovechando la oportunidad de mi participacion en el cursillo financiero programado en enero de 2016 en Hong Kong. 
					
					De acuerdo con que fue determinada mi peticion de turismo, decidi visitar la RPDC a finales de diciembre de 2015.
					
					El 23 de septiembre de 2015, tome la cena en la casa de mi amigo Stefan Webb junto con el y su madre Sharon Webb. Sharon Webb es diacona de la Iglesia Metodista Unida de Amistad y su hijo Stefan Webb es el creyente activo de esa iglesia.
					
					Sharon me dijo que su iglesia no apoya al gobierno de Norte de Corea y que el comunismo debe ser derrumbado. Prosiguio que los paises comunistas aglutinan a las masas con las consignas politicas. 
					
					Me pidio que me trajera una importante consigna politica del Norte de Corea para colgarla como "trofeo" en su iglesia. Continuo que al eliminar esas consignas hay que debilitar la unidad y el entusiasmo del pueblo norcoreano y demostrar que ese pais sea insultado por el Occidente.
					
					Me dijo que me daria un coche usado que vale 10 mil dolares si yo saliera con exito. Agrego que en el caso de detenerse la iglesia pagaria 200 mil dolares a mi madre por conducto de donacion. 
					
					Mi familia sufria grandes dificultades financieras y yo considere que eso es la unica oportunidad para ganar el dinero. Sharon me aconsejo no mencionar jamas en cualquier caso el hecho de la intervencion de la Iglesia Metodista Unida de Amistad. E intimido que no pagaria nada en el caso de revelarlo. 
					
					A principios de octubre de 2015, explique sencillamente a mi madre sobre mi plan y le dije que ingresara en la cuenta de banco de madre el dinero a ser utilizado como gastos para estudios de mis hermanos menores durante su carrera universitaria en caso de que yo fuera arrestado en la RPDC tras fracasar mi plan de robar lo importante en ese pais. Entonces, mi madre nego llorando mi plan calificandolo como accion peligrosa.
					
					Me quede indeciso al leer el alma inquietada de mi madre, pero tome decision de cumplir la mision de crimen tras ser seducido y presionado varias veces por la Iglesia Metodista Unida de Amistad.
					
					Yo deseaba con ansia el ingreso a la Sociedad Z desde cuando conoci que todos los miembros de ella viven ricos con empleos con mucho ingreso despues de la graduacion de la universidad y a fines de noviembre de 2015, revele de  proposito el plan de mi accion a un miembro de dicha sociedad.
					
					El me dijo que mi plan es bien adecuado al proposito de la sociedad de divulgar la "libertad" y eliminar el "poder autocratico" y me comprometio a ayudarme mucho para ingresarme a la sociedad si yo logro exitos en el cumplimiento de mi plan. Y dijo que si yo fuera arrestado, la sociedad impondra presion al Norte de Corea a ponerme en libertad y yo debo tener en secreto la incitacion de la Sociedad Z.
					
					Otto Frederick Warmbier dijo que ejecuto su plan tras llegar a Pyongyang via Beijing y continuo que su crimen es muy grave y preparado con anticipacion.
					
					A continuacion, Warmbier respondio a las preguntas de los reporteros del interior y exterior.
					
					El senalo que los politicos y la administracion de EE.UU. intentan perjudicar la RPDC con malignos medios y metodos movilizando la Iglesia Metodista Unida de Amistad y revelo que esta iglesia le dio la mision de crimen con el fin de divulgar en la RPDC el cristianismo sumandose a la obstinada politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y recibir mayor patrocinio de la administracion norteamericana. 
					
					Warmbier revelo que su crimen es el fruto planeado de la politica hostil anti-RPDC de la administracion norteamericana y las actividades de la Iglesia Metodista Unida de Amistad para realizarla.
					
					Y menciono que la Sociedad Z relacionada intimamente con la Agencia Central de Inteligencia de EE.UU., le incito a cometer delito y el mismo lo preparo previamente en EE.UU.
					
					Dijo que el mismo recibe en Pyongyang justas formalidades legales y el tratamiento humanitario.
					
					Al fin, Warmbier dijo que el comprendio que el "problema de DDHH" de la RPDC, cuestionado obstinadamente por la administracion norteamericana, no pasa de ser una excusa hipocrita para derrumbar el gobierno de la RPDC y pidio disculpas al pueblo y al gobierno de esta por sus actos criminales.

articles.title: Emitidos en RPDC nuevos sellos referentes a lanzamiento de Kwangmyongsong-4
articles.content:
Emitidos en RPDC nuevos sellos referentes a lanzamiento de Kwangmyongsong-4
Pyongyang, 29 de febrero (ACNC) -- Fueron emitidos en la Repblica Popular Democrtica de Corea nuevos sellos (dos gneros del papel enterizo de pequeo tamao) referentes al lanzamiento exitoso de satlite de observacin de la Tierra Kwangmyongsong-4.
					En la parte superior de los sellos se ven las letras: "lanzamiento exitoso de satlite de observacin de la Tierra Kwangmyongsong-4" y est dibujado el satlite volando al espacio.
					
					En un sello se ven la imagen del Mariscal Kim Jong Un dirigiendo el lanzamiento de satlite y su orden escrita de lanzar el satlite.
					
					La otra que muestra Kwangmyongsong-4 girando por la orbita polar, hace conocer el ngulo de inclinacin, la altitud de perigeo, la altitud de apogeo y el ciclo de satlite de la Corea del Juche.

articles.title: ACNC comenta pauta de doble rasero a estilo norteamericano
articles.content:
ACNC comenta pauta de doble rasero a estilo norteamericano
Pyongyang, 29 de febrero (ACNC) -- Ahora, Estados Unidos aboga por la presion internacional y "sancion" acusando el lanzamiento del satelite de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de violacion de las "resoluciones" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					Esto deviene la violacion grosera y el grave desafio a la soberania de la RPDC.
					
					El lanzamiento de nuestro satelite de fines pacificos es el digno derecho independiente de un Estado soberano, reconocido por la ley internacional superior a la resolucion del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, razon por la cual, nadie puede impedirlo.
					
					La censura aviesa y el alboroto de "sanciones" de los norteamericanos contra el lanzamiento de nuestro satelite es el manifiesto intensivo de la extremada politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
					
					Ellos hablan de que es todo legitimo el lanzamiento de sus satelites, pero ilegal el lanzamiento de nuestros satelites. Esta logica bandidesca es precisamente el apogeo de la pauta de doble rasero a estilo norteamericano.
					
					Stefan Landman, senalo en su articulo intitulado "Pauta de doble rasero del Occidente sobre Norte de Corea (RPDC)", publicado en la pagina Web del Instituto de Globalizacion de Canada, que es una gran absurdidad la "resolucion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU que impide a Pyongyang utilizar la tecnica de misil balistica. Tal resolucion nunca se aplica en el Occidente y en ningun pais del mundo. Esto es claramente el climax de la pauta de doble rasero.
					
					"En estos dias, el CS de la ONU discute sobre la 'sancion' contra el lanzamiento de satelite del Norte de Corea, pero el lanzamiento de satelite es el derecho legitimo de un Estado soberano. Si cuestiona de esta manera el lanzamiento de satelite del Norte de Corea, se aprobara en algun tiempo nueva 'resolucion' que impide vender cuchillos de cocina en las redes comerciales del Norte de Corea, partiendo de la preocupacion de que con estos pueden matar a la gente.", asi burlo el profesor y doctor de la Facultad de Socioeconomia de Noreste de Asia de la Universidad de Viena de Austria.
					
					El primer coronel del Ministerio de Defensa de Espana dijo que todos los paises aptos pueden lanzar el satelite artificial, por eso, "sancionar" solamente al Norte de Corea es la pauta de doble rasero. Tambien forma otra pauta de doble rasero impedir al Norte de Corea utilizar la tecnica de misil balistico porque ese pais posee armas nucleares. En efecto, India y Pakistan, poseedores de armas nucleares, realizan ordinariamente el lanzamiento de misiles balisticas intercontinentales, pero nadie lo cuestiona. Y el posgraduado del Centro de Estudios de No Proliferacion James Martin de Estados Unidos hablo con firmeza que puesto que fue disenado como proyectil espacial, el cohete lanzado por el Norte de Corea es cierto el lanzamiento de satelite e insistio en que para calificarlo de misil balistica intercontinental, se necesita el cambio considerable del diseno.
					
					Como estima la sociedad internacional, el lanzamiento de satelite de la RPDC nunca puede ser una amenaza a otros paises porque evidentemente es una actividad con fines pacificos.
					
					EE.UU. impide el lanzamiento del satelite de la RPDC cuestionandolo como "amenaza" a alguien. Si la RPDC obedece al imperio, no podra hacer nunca el lanzamiento de satelite, derecho legal de un Estado soberano.
					
					El imperio norteamericano militariza el cosmos en contra de  la demanda de la sociedad internacional y lanza los satelites de distintas misiones, incluso los espias, en cualquier momento y lugar, y lo impide a la RPDC. Es intolerable esta pauta de doble rasero. 
					
					EE.UU. debera abandonar primero sus maniobras de militarizacion espacial que es gran amenaza a la paz y seguridad internacionales, en lugar de cuestionar las actividades de la RPDC para desarrollar el espacio, digno ejercicio de soberania de un Estado soberano.
					
					EE.UU. no debe reaccionar demasiado al lanzamiento de satelite de la RPDC con la concepcion de confrontacion sino verlo con los ojos imparciales.
					
					Lanzar y administrar el satelite de uso practico, aparato indispensable para el desarrollo economico y la prosperidad  del pais, es una demanda legitima de la epoca de las ciencias y tecnicas sofisticadas y una tendencia mundial.
					
					La posicion de la RPDC como pais elaborador y lanzador de satelite artificial no se cambia nunca aunque lo niega EE.UU., y la RPDC nunca abandonara el desarrollo espacial arrodillandose ante las "sanciones".
					
					En el futuro tambien la RPDC alcanzara mayores exitos en el desarrollo de cosmos para defender la dignidad de la nacion.
					
					Sera una ilusion vana el intento de EE.UU. de esperar el derrumbe de la RPDC mediante las "sanciones".
					
					Si EE.UU., preso por el veto a la RPDC, sigue intentando arrebatar a la RPDC el derecho independiente y legitimo, esta se vera obligada a tomar las contramedidas concernientes.
